C

CesarCode - Class in plugins
This pluginTest applies a Cesar code to the text (ie. a shift by 1 character: 'a' into 'b', 'b' into 'c',...
CesarCode() - Constructor for class plugins.CesarCode
a Cesar code where shift is 1
CesarCode(int) - Constructor for class plugins.CesarCode
Create a code where the shift of character is more than 1 (no more a strict Cesar code)
convert(File) - Method in class plugin.Convertor
Converts a file into a plugin, it's the same effect as a cast.
Convertor - Class in plugin
The class Convertor is used to convert a File into a Plugin.
Convertor() - Constructor for class plugin.Convertor
